#summary Use case for handling the addition of a book to the user's shopping cart.
#labels Phase-Requirements,UseCases

= Introduction =

*Description:*

The user wants to add an available book to his/her shopping cart.

*Preconditions:*
 # The user has registered and active user account.
 # The user is logged in.
 # The selected book is not in the user's shopping cart.
 # The selected book is an active listing and is for sale by the owner.

*Postconditions:*
 # The selected book will be added to the user's shopping cart.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # The user views a book listing that he/she wants to add to his/her shopping cart.
 # The user clicks on the *Add To Cart* button.
 # The system checks that the book is not already added to the user's cart, and that the book is available.
 # The system adds the book to the user's shopping cart. 
 # Use case ends.
